description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Michael Hunger - Caretaker of the Neo4j community and ecosystem

ABSTRACT
In this talk I want to detail the process and the technologies used by the journalists for their investigative work, including Apache Solr Apache Tika, and Neo4j. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7745

https://twitter.com/gotocph
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
http://gotocon.com
